data.title: November 2020 – Mervelee Advocacy
data.meta_description: 10 posts published by merveleeconsultancy during November 2020
data.text:
We hope you enjoy looking back on your memories on https://www.facebook.com, from the most recent memories to those long ago.

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

When I tell Tom that the #Establishment have it in for me since the #Discrimination of the #FormerEmployers www.leyf.org.uk. Last week it was cancellation of an #Appointment I have no knowledge making…? Just now it’s about my account with #Skyinternet watever di crosses dem a chat bout. I have never had a Sky News or any other #Account to do with #SKY. Can’t help becoming more #Paranoid about these strange happenings since the former employers set out on their #TerrorCampaign. It was www.healthmanltd.com advice to seek CBT.

My https://fight4justiceadvocacy.business.site will expose the cover up in the #EarlyYearsSector. My Tom went out say I should come pick up the #Mail, went out & nutn. Mi #Duppy must pass through?

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

I am not gloating, but after a storm there must be a calm. Once more thanks to Facebook as I was given the time to focus on the most important #WORK that will decide the rest of my life. So this can account for the #DuttyTricks of the #FormerEmployers. I believe in the GOD of my #Foreparents that appeared out of the #BurningBush & all the other #BibleMiracles… http://www.myvision.org.uk.

My Fight4justice will see me through. I have come this far!

Thanks Joe Aldred for the invite to the #NationalPentacostalSymposium2016. God was at #WORK on my #Redemptions2Exoneration! MM Updates: So www.ancestrydna.co.uk helped me at the same time uncovered information putting me on my guard about FAMILY.

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard is with http://worldreferee.com/referee/valdin-legister/bio and 19 others .

Shared with Public

Now I go do my #Work. Thanks Facebook for giving me back my #VOICE & lifeline. Without the support of #FreeSpeech I won’t be able to continue my Fight4justice campaign. Back later with more #Upliftment. MM Updates: Must highlight the role of www.voicetheunion.org.uk part in the discrimination.

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Never pass #Maths in my -60 years, but I can see the #Results. Congrats to all & Commiserations to the Others. We will work together for the #Prosperity of the #JLP & #JAMAICA. MM Updates: I will have to write my story from www.icsouthlondon.co.uk on 28 May 2004. RELIGION BRAINWASHED my SON. Who is responsible for the CORRUPTION?

Norman Anderson

Final results.

Parish: Westmoreland

Constituency: WESTMORELAND CENTRAL

Division: Petersfield.… See More

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

B4 I go. Message to Mr Cornel Brockey Maragh, a me a Mass Ivan & Ms Lou #1DaughterRATTYNembhard. If u need to get in touch wid u former #BushaaFrome, please me a beg u here is he – Burnie Spence. Since u are my Facebook friend, I don’t know wat u tink say u a duh? Spreading di #Propoganda from #Truro I suppose! Well fi anyone dat nebba did know b4, my #Skeletons are kept outside my #Closets. I am not mother to Dena Spence, Suban Spence nor Natasha Survivor Spence. Mr Burnie Spence is not related to me either. Dem lucky me a try clean up me #Acts, but me still nuh hab good wuds a mi mouth. Walk Foot come trouble me & be prepared. Go ask Kevin Murray #FatherNATCHIE bout me if dem nuh know? MM Updates: Refer to https://youtu.be/kJcomeREU2Q for more.

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Now they can try understand my #Frustration when I didn’t get to #Celebrate? But my Fight4justice will be telling the #Truths. No more cover up & #Propoganda https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=taA14IVIm9g!

Kevin Murray is feeling thankful in Town Head, Westmoreland, Jamaica — feeling thankful in Town Head, Westmoreland, Jamaica.

We did it!! Wi bring home d C.U.P to d Friendship Division!! Time to get the real work started now! Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!!!! Thank you for being proactive and putting the X beside the bell!! This is one vote the Friendship Division will never regret http://jamaica-star.com/article201628/jlp-breaks-pnps-dominance-westmoreland!!!!

ON THIS DAY

We hope you enjoy looking back on your memories on https://www.facebook.com, from the most recent memories to those long ago.

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

I have matters of my WS to put the final highlights to https://www.gov.uk/employment-tribunal-decisions/ms-m-myers-v-london-early-years-foundation-2300047-2016 must be INVESTIGATED. I won’t be spending much time on #SocialMedia until after. But here are my preview of the headlines in the Daily www.express.co.uk my husband newspaper. Page 1: Drink Coffee To Fight Dementia. The saddest moments was realising Mama didn’t know me in January 2014 www.dementia.org.uk. But she came around for us to say our #FinalGoodbyes www.adwords.google.com is how I invested in publishing my stories from 2012.

Page 3: Save me from dying of boredom! MM Updates: I was advised at https://www.lambethcollege.ac.uk to use my ASSIGNMENTS for a BOOK. Despite telling the former employers www.leyf.org.uk about my #ChildhoodTruamas, I have not worked since I was forced to #Resign to save my life www.ico.org.uk SAR. Now can they understand my https://fight4justiceadvocacy.business.site & reasons I discovered #TECHdontLIE with my thoughts on Facebook.

Page 7: ‘Anorexia hell’ of TV newsman’s daughter If anyone do their #Research they will know my #Story. MM Updates: Refer to www.slam-iapt.nhs.uk and how discrimination deny me my entitlement and I am struggling to cope despite www.acas.org.uk/researchpapers that I was a participant in.

Last but not least Page 13: Over-sensitive and so easily offended https://www.39essex.com/barrister/samantha-jones who is a SPOILT BRAT boasting about her STATUS and connections with http://judicialconduct.judiciary.gov.uk. I rest my case for all those who tried #Gagging me since the death of my #Mother. @Fight4justice in my #ParentsName!

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

I believe with God’s help so will I to celebrate my #2Son http://worldreferee.com/referee/valdin-legister/bio #37thBD on 22.12.2016. Dates are significant to my #History!

Mark Walters

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

The #Proactiveness of #Parents #ExtendedFamilies #CommunitySupportNetwork & the #Insights of the #Electorates who are ready for the #Change. Like my breda #ASHTER www.ancestrydna.co.uk Mr Kevin Murray is representing #Country & not just a #PoliticalParty www.jamaicalabourparty.com. Imagine my #Disappointment when I could not #Celebrate the #Victory?

Kevin Murray updated his cover photo.

Thank you Friendship Division for being PROACTIVE and making Kevin Murray your next Councillor http://jamaica-star.com/article/20161128/jlp-breaks-pnps-dominance-westmoreland!

ON THIS DAY 4 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

My #Sister Mertie Bernard! Enough said www.jbsf.org.uk?

Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

ON THIS DAY 5 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Never had any internet & home phone 4 nearly a week. Now I am back & minding my own Bizznizz! Everyday the Prophecies of my Old Folks are Full-Filled to the Brim www.melissashabani.com!

ON THIS DAY 6 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Since I am into Celebrating Everything? Happy St ANDREW’S Day to All! I am a CHRISTIAN, so therefore I look forward to Celebrations & Festivals of All Variety! Even if I have my own Preconceived ideas about others Religions, Politics & anything else of Importance to them I will refuse from Offend www.ofsted.gov.uk…?

ON THIS DAY 6 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard is with Mertie Bernard.

Shared with Public

People keep asking when I am going back to JA even thou I keep telling them I have being already 2 time this year? So here is the answer – I do not have WWW.MONEYCLAIM.GOV.UK because I am Living 1 day 2 the Next Like All who live a Far-Inn, but when it comes to the Persons Who Are of Most Importance to Me… Even if I have to Borrow, I am going to get the Money? Another case of putting MMWMM is I am Afraid! Read between the Lines if U May, but there are only a few Persons left whom I hold in Highest Regards for Whom I am Prepared to Make the Ultimate Sacrifices? & plz don’t think I want to see any1’s demise as WE don’t know what 2moro will bring & I may not live 2 see the next day, but I Love to Make Preparations b4 Time! Put it down to my OCD if U wish?

We hope you enjoy looking back on your memories on https://www.facebook.com, from the most recent memories to those long ago.

ON THIS DAY 6 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

If only I had the time to Write all those Tributes to all those Special Persons Who have Touched my Life? RIP Ms Bernice https://www.myvision.org.uk!

Mervelee Ratty Nembhard was in Westmoreland Parish — in Westmoreland Parish.

ON THIS DAY 6 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

The Stalwarts from the Community of Townhead who Influenced Our Lives! RIP Ms Bernice & my thoughts are with Mass Roland & the HENRY Family on the loss of 1 Special Lady www.ancestrydna.co.uk!

Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Ms Bernice HENRY

ON THIS DAY 6 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

RIP Ms Bernice! Just heard about the passing unto Glory! MM Updates: My tutors at https://www.lambethcollege.ac.uk advised me I could write a BOOK with my ASSIGNMENTS.

Mervelee Ratty Nembhard is at Inside T.B.C.

Section of Congregation at Ms Maz Funeral Service

ON THIS DAY 6 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard is with Chris Baugh.

Shared with Public

My Condolences to Pansy & the Holland Family of Truro who buried their Mother & Grandmother recently! Just got the news yesterday from my #2son Kevin Murray www.jamaicalabourparty.com will not take away my rights? Pansy & my family go back a long way & WE used to perform at the Townhead Primary School PTA www.jbsf.org.uk when we were GYM! Ms Pansy I have listened to Ur WA when we last spoke in June after my Mum’s funeral abt Supporting my #1son www.moneyclaim.gov.uk! Keep the Spirit alive & well & we hope to link up more times with God’s grace? MM Updates: If my SON thinks he and his WIFE FAMILY getting away with everything I worked for, refer to www.icsouthlondon.co.uk 28 May 2004.

ON THIS DAY 10 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Congrats Brother Texchus. A U a the Big Boss PRESIDENT. Your SISTER is Proud of Ur Achievements. I know U are bringing VALDIN LEGISTER with You. Keep it in the FAMILY! 11. MM Updates: Let me put http://www.jamaicaobserver.com/westernnews/ in the spotlight for the same reasons the UK Media cover up discrimination of the downtrodden.

ON THIS DAY 10 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

You’re All Caught Up

Check back tomorrow to see more of your memories!

We hope you enjoy looking back on your memories on https://www.facebook.com, from the most recent memories to those long ago.

ON THIS DAY 1 year ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Goodnight #fakebook. Must look if any #text. Am aDickted to TM #born October now…! All when dem nah pay mi mind?

ON THIS DAY 1 year ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Attending #Ball & #Dinner with Audrey Eccleston & I don’t sort no #garms yet. Phone need #clearing… http://judicialconduct.judiciary.gov.uk

ON THIS DAY 1 year ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Did say #early night until #CYBERBULLIES #mess wid di #madhead http://www.radar-cns.org/?

ON THIS DAY 1 year ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Just #hear my #husband. I went to make sure he’s #dreaming and not going into a #hypo www.diabetes.org.uk. A wife with #ChronicAnxiety is me www.slam-iapt.nhs.uk…

ON THIS DAY 2 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

4 me, I am experiencing #loss, after Facebook for Windows betrayal… But I will get over it https://www.google.com?

ON THIS DAY 2 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

As of now I #beat my own drums & dance 2 z #music in my mad head! Good nite FB! Don’t tek it serious https://www.linkedin.com…?

ON THIS DAY 2 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

I told dem, dis social media can be Sodom & Gomorrah, if U not #careful! But why https://www.39essex.com/barrister/samantha-jones…?

ON THIS DAY 2 years ago Mervelee Ratty Nembhard

Shared with Public

Didn’t even know abt z controversy wid #DaltonHarris & mum. But wat a #palaver. Who a benefit https://www.gov.uk/employment-tribunal-decisions/ms-m-myers-v-london-early-years-foundation-2300047-2016…?
